name: Cruisin' Cones
description:
V. 1.1

Welcome to Cruisin Cones! In this game you control a car and try to avoid traffic cones.  Hold the "w" key to move your car up and hold the "s" key to move your car down. Make sure to stay on the road or you will lose! Get past 10 traffic cones and you will win! Happy Driving!
